title: Drawing, "Design for Ark Curtain with Menorah Encircled by Wreath,  for a St. Louis Synagogue", ca. 1950
medium: Brush and gouache on silver patterned paper, residue of gold cellophane around edges, mounted on white cardboard
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink on old mat beneath lower left corner of drawing:  Temple St. Louis; below right corner of drawing:  Trude Guermonprez/Pond Farm
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: On silver patterned paper, a seven-branched blue menorah  in middle of orange circle with wreath of yellow leaves framing circle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Ark Curtain with Menorah Encircled by Wreath,  for a St. Louis Synagogue", ca. 1950.
ca. 1950. Brush and gouache on silver patterned paper, residue of gold cellophane around edges, mounted on white cardboard. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-41.
